description:
Do you want to get paid at least 20% Higher at The Entry Level ?

and You have no Idea HOW to ASK for MONEY?

YOU have Come to the RIGHT Place

Salary Negotiation can be one of the most stressful aspects of the job search and selection, especially when youâ€™re just Starting your career.

How do you justify Asking for More than the company is offering you, especially for an Entry-level position? Do you have Something Special that can help you negotiate. Is it even an option to negotiate?

Salary negotiation is an art and this course will help you learn just that. This course has been delivered several times to fresh graduates and has earned excellent feedback. Most of them got good salaries because they were taught the skill of negotiation in this course. The course will teach you how you can prove your worth better to employer. What to ask and what to answer during the negotiation. And most importantly what are your cards and when to play them during the negotiation process.

After taking this course you will understand that how YOUR opinion matters the most in this process. You will also be exposed to information of knowing the company and the Salary Range before going for the interview. You will know how different scenarios can present themselves in the negotiation process and how you can best help those situations.

The salary negotiation is a choice.. But you will have only one shot at it... So you might as well do that right!
title: How To Negotiate A New Job Position
